txt.en:
[placeholder],

Word has reached me that there are people in need. I require someone of your skill to take on this challenge and forge your way through adversity. Seek me out and deliver this letter.

Tralli
'It is good to see that you responded so swiftly. This proves that you are one who desires to aid those in need... this is good.'
You received a letter from your trainer in Bree-town asking for you to return to him. Apparently, there is something that he wishes to teach you.
Bring the letter to Tralli in Bree
Tralli sent you a letter requesting that you visit him near the Bree Jail.\n\nDeliver the letter to Tralli. He can be found near the Bree Jail.
